Author: unicorn_pianos
Text: Thanks. I had no idea what the class was going to be until I showed up. We still did some strength building exercises but I agree, the cardio is too much for me mentally.

Author: paperklipp
Text: It might help to stay away from aggressive cardio. I definitely associate that with my ED because of spending hours on the elliptical and treadmill. If youâ€™re trying to build strength it would be better to focus on weights and weightlifting anyway, maybe try out some dumbbell exercises or the weights machine on different settings.
